author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

-    Fix erroneous continue that prevented GenCands isFromB/C information to be calculated
-> On average 10.29+/-0.42 charged GenCands, in agreement with [CLEO measurement](https://arxiv.org/abs/hep-ex/9907057) (10.7+/-0.2)
-    Traverse mother link until we find a hadron that exists in the finalGenParticles collection


#### PR validation:

```
Pass    7s ... PhysicsTools/NanoAOD/testPhysicsToolsNanoAODTP
Pass   78s ... PhysicsTools/NanoAOD/test-btvNano-run
Pass    3s ... PhysicsTools/NanoAOD/test-btvNano-check
```

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48860 for btvNano production.
title: [15_0_X] btvNano: fix link between GenCands and decayed hadrons
